Nothing spectacular. Still me though

Hi, my name is flo. I am a front-end dev based in France. I work as Customer Sucess Manager at odaseva.com, a young and dynamic startup, and I also freelance on the side, running my own design/development shop.

odaseva.com

odaseva.com is the team of Salesforce specialists behind Odaseva for Salesforce, a platform offering Backup & Recovery capabilities, as well as Release Management Tools to Salesforce customers. The company has a wide range of enterprise customers, including Fortune 500 companies, and operates from both beautiful France & sunny San Francisco.
If you're into Salesforce, chek out odaseva.com

shoogle designs

shoogle designs is a freelance one-man web design shop I created in 2013 to bring the design/business experience I had gathered during 15+ years spent within large firms to help smaller companies. I quickly specialized in responsive web design (like everybody else) when the trend emerged, often use Wordpress, Perch and Jekyll as prefered CMS solutions, and love drinking pints with my clients.

Wanna discuss projects / Say Hi ?
